content: this is my last and free pattern of 2024 to say thank you for everyone that s supported me spirit of the stars has two patterns row by row and center out you can choose which you want to do or both overlay mosaic crochet technique using us terminology in english only with this download you get spirit of the stars center out spirit of the stars row by row joining the center out squares pdf beginners to overlay mosaic crochet envelope border for the row by row pattern so please check your library for all these pdfs for the center out pattern there s a link to a video of how to do center out mosaic my square in dk yarn with a size 4 hook measures 10inches/26cm squared i used 22g of each colour per square that s approximately 66m per colour so per square you d need a total of 132m my tester information is at the bottom of the pdf the square has 22 rounds chart with xs for the row by row pattern it s a 46+1 repeat pattern in us terms you repeat the pattern as many times as you wish and only at the end of the row do the last stitch use whatever colours you want and thickness of yarn all repeats below have the anchor stitches last stitch and turning chain for your first single_crochet of row 1 not if you re doing a chainless foundation 1 repeat chain 50 chainless foundation 49 2 repeats chain 96 chainless foundation 95 3 repeats chain 142 chainless foundation 141 4 repeats chain 188 chain-less foundation 187 5 repeats chain 234 chain-less foundation 233 chart with xs as you will see from the photos my testers have done amazing work thank you all pauline billingham shari streb janice seppala lita-rosa brighton bernie lettett shari streb terri griffith kelly moredock sandy clark sue sweet melanie mitchell cindy daling atelier du bonheur and patricia ullrich their information is in the pdfs please share your creations in my facebook group and everywhere i love to see your work in my news feed it always brightens my day if you need any help either email me here athey sarah@outlook com or join my facebook group here https //www facebook com/groups/809381026680096/ i run free crochet alongs yearly feel free to sell or gift your finished projects
